mapper.select:
select st.id from fd_status st where st.organization_id = #{organizationId}
AND st.name LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.name},'%')
AND st.type LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.type},'%')
AND st.description LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.description},'%')
AND ( st.name LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.param},'%') OR st.description LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.param},'%') )

select fs.id, fs.name, fs.code, fs.type, smn.id as nodeId, smn.state_machine_id, IF(smn.type = 'node_init',1,0) as defaultStatus
, ais.is_completed as completed
from fd_status fs join fd_status_machine_node smn on ( fs.organization_id = smn.organization_id and fs.id = smn.status_id and smn.state_machine_id = #{stateMachineId} )
left join agile_issue_status ais on ais.project_id = #{projectId} and fs.id = ais.status_id
where fs.organization_id = #{organizationId} order by smn.rank, smn.id

select fs.id, fs.name, fs.code, fs.type, smn.object_version_number from fd_status fs,fd_status_machine_node smn where fs.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND smn.organization_id = fs.organization_id AND smn.status_id = fs.id AND smn.state_machine_id = #{stateMachineId}
AND fs.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param}), '%')

select fs.id, fs.name, fs.code, fs.description, fs.type, fs.object_version_number, ais.is_completed as completed from fd_status fs join agile_issue_status ais on (ais.project_id = #{projectId} and fs.id = ais.status_id) where fs.organization_id = #{organizationId}
AND fs.name LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.name},'%')
AND fs.type LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.type},'%')
AND fs.description LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.description},'%')
AND ( fs.name LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.param},'%') OR fs.description LIKE concat('%',#{statusSearchVO.param},'%') )
